New Feature: Added Final Move Cards in Panel Settings
Update: Improved Reports of the day and night in God Panel
Update: User Interface and User Experience for Web Application
Update: Improved App speed and performance
Fix: All reported bugs and issues

New Character : Gunman for Citizen team
New Character : Khan for Citizen team
New Character : Freemasoner for Citizen team

home.title: MafiaBuzz is a web application for playing The Mafia party game
home.description: MafiaBuzz is a web application to set up and manage the 'Mafia Party Game' easily. People can set up their game and choose multiple roles as a creator to start playing the game in a group of friends or family

howtoplay.title: How to Play?
howtoplay.subtitle: 🔍 Just read and everything is so clear

steps.desc1:
Mafia is a party game with modeling a conflict between two groups: an informed minority ( Tho Mafia ), and an uninformed majority ( The Citizens ). At the start of the game, each player is secretly assigned a role affiliated with one of these teams. The game has two alternating phases:
Night, during which the mafia may covertly 'murder' a citizen, and Day, in which surviving players debate the identities of the mafia and vote to eliminate a suspect. The game continues until all the mafia players have been eliminated or the mafia outnumber the citizens.

Mafia is a popular and interesting party game, but always it is hard to control and manage the game by the game moderator ( God ) when you want to play it with a large group of people.
MafiaBuzz is a web application created by a team of developers and gamers. With the help of the application, you just have to select players and characters to start the game. Write the name of each person and give the phone to them to see their roles. After that God can start the game and app will tell him what to do, calculate possibilities and show the result.
MafiaBuzz team will add new characters to the game in a small period of time.

Game is played by two teams: Tho Mafia and The Citizens ( There is a team named Solo and it is part of citizen's team but they can win the game seperately from citizens with their abilities ). Live games require a moderator ( God ) who does not participate as a player, and identities are assigned by application. At the start of the game, every mafioso is given the identities of their teammates, whereas citizens only receive the number of mafioso in the game, and do not know which players are mafia and which are citizens.
There are two phases: Night and Day. At Night, certain players secretly perform special actions; during Day, players discuss and vote to kill one player. These phases alternate with each other until all mafioso have been eliminated or until the mafia outnumbers the citizens.
Some players may be given roles with special abilities (Chosen by Game Creator)

Night: All players close their eyes. The moderator then instructs all members of The Mafia to open their eyes and acknowledge their accomplices. Similar process for waking up pepole occurs by moderator for other roles with nightly actions.

Day: The moderator instructs players to open their eyes and announces what happened the previous night. Discussion ensues among the living players. At any point, a player may accuse someone of being a mafioso and prompt others to vote to kill them. If over half of the players do so, the accused person is eliminated and Night begins. Otherwise, thos phase continues until a killing occurs. Dead players are not permitted to attempt to influence the remainder of the game. Because players have more freedom to deliberate, Days tend to be longer than Nights.
Different characters and roles are making MafiaBuzz much funnier and more enjoyable. In below we are explaining about each character seperately:

powerMeter.title: Team balance based on selected characters

addCharacter.addCharacterDescription: Add your own character to game and play with it. (God should manage ability and passive of character by himself)

god.name: God
god.godButton: I'm God! Show me game details
god.actionHintText: Please select the person who takes action :
god.question: Please select the answer :
god.lastPhaseText: Please select who died during the day with people's vote :
god.revengeText: Please select a target to get revenge :
god.justiceText: Judge used his ability!!! Tell people to close their eyes and judge will decide who is going to die
god.mafiaPartyText: Tell Mafia members to open their eyes and see each other
mafiaPartyException: If Nostradamus is in game, should open his eyes first.
Drunk should not open his eyes, and must inform his team by raising his hand
Traitor should not wake up at all.
god.errorChoosePlayer: Please choose a Player or Answer before executing an action
god.resetText: Do you want to reset game with same characters?
god.resetTotalText: Are you sure? Your selected characters and players will reset
god.skipText: Do you want to skip this action for tonight?
god.godKill: God used his power and killed :
god.godRevive: God used his power and revived :
god.voteKill: People killed this person by vote :
god.hackedPerson: is Hacked...!!! Just wake him up but he is unable to perform an action.
god.inJailPerson: is in Prison...!!! He is unable to perform an action.
god.roleReplacedPerson: has been changed by Yakuza...!!! You should pretend and play as if the player is alive.
god.deadPerson: is Dead...!!! You should pretend and play as if the player is alive.
god.revivedPerson: is Revived...!!! But doesn't have his role anymore.
god.actionQuestion2: to wake up and tell you the target/s for
god.roleViewerText: Announce result of searching for dead pepole to the city
god.noRolesToView: There is no role to show!

dashboardHint.name: angel
dashboardHint.hint: Bring back Player to life by God power

dashboardHint.name: pending-action
dashboardHint.hint: Player has action but not used.

dashboardHint.name: disabled
dashboardHint.hint: Player has no action or passive.

dashboardHint.name: kill-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has ability to kill at night.

dashboardHint.name: link-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has been linked to another player and when one of them dies, the other dies aswell

dashboardHint.name: silence-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has been silenced and can't talk during next day

dashboardHint.name: hack-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player is hacked and can't use action or passive this night

dashboardHint.name: shield-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player has shield that prevents one death at night

dashboardHint.name: heal-icon
dashboardHint.hint: Player is healed and can't be killed

lie.name: Thirteen Lie
lie.description: Tell a lie about yourself and god will confirm it

redCarpet.name: Red Carpet
redCarpet.description: Choose one person to go straight to defense tomorrow

greenLine.name: Green Line
greenLine.description: Choose one person so that tomorrow he does not go on the defensive

mindRead.name: Beautiful Mind
mindRead.description: Guess someone's role correctly to stay in the game

sleepless.name: Sleepless
sleepless.description: It won't be night and we will go straight to the next day

judgeDay.name: Judge Day
judgeDay.description: The next day will go to the vote phase without talking

exhumation.name: Exhumation
exhumation.description: Choose one of the people outside the game to announce his role to the city

showIdentity.name: Show Identity
showIdentity.description: Reveal your identity to the city

luckyDay.name: Lucky Day
luckyDay.description: Today is your lucky day, get back in game

will.name: Will
will.description: Make a will before leaving the game

headCount.name: Headcount
headCount.description: God must announce the inquiry of the dead in the game to the city

gamble.name: Gamble
gamble.description: Choose one person so God will draw death lot between you, the winner stays in the game

faceOff.name: Face Off
faceOff.description: Choose one person so that your roles will be changed. God will secretly announce the new role to the person
